languages.text: {n}Арбитес кивает.{/n} "Да, сработались. Предлагаю вернуться к этому вопросу позже. "Бессердечный" теперь ваш, как мы и договаривались".
{n}The Arbitrator nods.{/n} "Yes, we do. But we can return to this later. The Heartless now belongs to you, as agreed."
languages.original_text: {n}Арбитес кивает.{/n} "Да, сработались. Предлагаю вернуться к этому вопросу позже. "Бессердечный" теперь ваш, как мы и договаривались".

traits.locale_text: {n}The Arbitrator nods.{/n} "Yes, we do. But we can return to this later. The Heartless now belongs to you, as agreed."

{n}The Arbitrator nods.{/n} "Yes, we do. But we can return to this later. The Heartless now belongs to you, as agreed."

languages.text: {n}El Arbitrator asiente.{/n} «Así es, pero podemos hablar de ello más adelante. Como acordamos, la Desalmada es suya».
languages.original_text: {n}The Arbitrator nods.{/n} "Yes, we do. But we can return to this later. The Heartless now belongs to you, as agreed."

traits.locale_text: {n}El Arbitrator asiente.{/n} «Así es, pero podemos hablar de ello más adelante. Como acordamos, la Desalmada es suya».

languages.text: {n}索罗蒙点了点头。{/n}“是啊，确实如此，不过这个话题可以稍后再谈。按照约定，无心号现在归你所有。”
languages.original_text: {n}The Arbitrator nods.{/n} "Yes, we do. But we can return to this later. The Heartless now belongs to you, as agreed."

traits.locale_text: {n}索罗蒙点了点头。{/n}“是啊，确实如此，不过这个话题可以稍后再谈。按照约定，无心号现在归你所有。”

languages.text: {n}L'arbitrator opine du chef.{/n} « Tout à fait, mais nous y reviendrons plus tard. Pour l'heure, le Sans-Cœur vous appartient, comme convenu. »
languages.original_text: {n}The Arbitrator nods.{/n} "Yes, we do. But we can return to this later. The Heartless now belongs to you, as agreed."

traits.locale_text: {n}L'arbitrator opine du chef.{/n} « Tout à fait, mais nous y reviendrons plus tard. Pour l'heure, le Sans-Cœur vous appartient, comme convenu. »

languages.text: {n}アービトレイターはうなずく。{/n}「ああ、そうです。しかし、そのことについては後でお話ししましょう。約束したとおり、ハートレスは今あなたのものです」
languages.original_text: {n}The Arbitrator nods.{/n} "Yes, we do. But we can return to this later. The Heartless now belongs to you, as agreed."

traits.locale_text: {n}アービトレイターはうなずく。{/n}「ああ、そうです。しかし、そのことについては後でお話ししましょう。約束したとおり、ハートレスは今あなたのものです」

languages.text: {n}Yargıcı başını sallıyor.{/n} "Evet, olduk. Bu konuyu daha sonra konuşabiliriz. Taşkalp, anlaştığımız üzere artık sizindir."
languages.original_text: {n}The Arbitrator nods.{/n} "Yes, we do. But we can return to this later. The Heartless now belongs to you, as agreed."

traits.locale_text: {n}Yargıcı başını sallıyor.{/n} "Evet, olduk. Bu konuyu daha sonra konuşabiliriz. Taşkalp, anlaştığımız üzere artık sizindir."

languages.text: {n}Der Arbitrator nickt.{/n} "Ja, das sind wir. Aber das besprechen wir später. Die Heartless gehört nun wie vereinbart Euch."
languages.original_text: {n}The Arbitrator nods.{/n} "Yes, we do. But we can return to this later. The Heartless now belongs to you, as agreed."

traits.locale_text: {n}Der Arbitrator nickt.{/n} "Ja, das sind wir. Aber das besprechen wir später. Die Heartless gehört nun wie vereinbart Euch."
